gffcompare_multiple_gtf_tracking[source]

gffcompare_multiple_gtf_tracking(tracking_file, outdir, names=None, split=True)

The tracking file in results of gffcompare -r anno.gtf 1.gtf 2.gtf 3.gtf ... Extract transcript list for each sample, which would be used to draw venn diagram

:param str tracking_file: tracking file :param str outdir: output direction :param list[str] names: names correspanding to q1,q2... in tracking file :param bool split: wheather split different tags in to different files, if not, only consider class_code '=' and other than that.
